location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 1/36 Appointment of a Temporary Upper Division Clerk from 1 November 1935'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file. Circled serial numbers (red for received correspondence; blue/black for issued correspondence) refer to entries in the notes at the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation system in use commences at 1A on the front cover, and continues through to 23 on the back cover. The sequence is written in pencil, and appears in the top right hand corner of the recto page of each folio. Foliation anomalies: ff. 1A, 1B.

mods.abstract: The file consists of correspondence, telegrams, office orders, and a last pay certificate, and relates to the appointment, terms and conditions, travel costs, service, pay, and leave of an appointee to the position of Temporary Clerk in the Upper Division.

name.namePart: Bahrain Political Agency, Temporary Clerk, Upper Division
